descriptions: Causes a lightning explosion to 5 enemy nearby every 1s, dealing 15% MAG DMG and increasing damage received by the target by 5%, lasting 5s.
Causes a lightning explosion to 5 enemy nearby every 1s, dealing 22% MAG DMG and increasing damage received by the target by 10%, lasting 5s.
Causes a lightning explosion to 5 enemy nearby every 1s, dealing 37% MAG DMG and increasing damage received by the target by 15%, lasting 5s.
Causes a lightning explosion to 5 enemy nearby every 1s, dealing 60% MAG DMG and increasing damage received by the target by 20%, lasting 5s.
Fire 1 arcane energy ball at a target enemy, dealing 70% MAG DMG to all enemies near the target.
Fire 1 arcane energy ball at a target enemy, dealing 95% MAG DMG to all enemies near the target.
Fire 2 arcane energy balls at a target enemy, each blast dealing 95% MAG DMG to all enemies near the target.
Fire 3 arcane energy balls at a target enemy, each blast dealing 110% MAG DMG to all enemies near the target.
Rapidly unleash 1 arrow shots from Arcane power source in a single direction, move freely and MOVSPD+40% while firing, each arrow deals MAG DMG that equals to 7% of sum of your ATK and AP.
Rapidly unleash 1 arrow shots from Arcane power source in a single direction, move freely and MOVSPD+40% while firing, each arrow deals MAG DMG that equals to 12% of sum of your ATK and AP.

Rapidly unleash 1 arrow shots from Arcane power source in a single direction, move freely and MOVSPD+40% while firing, each arrow deals MAG DMG that equals to 19% of sum of your ATK and AP. Open extra 3 power sources, dealing MAG DMG equals to 5% of your ATK + AP.

Rapidly unleash 1 arrow shots from Arcane power source in a single direction, move freely and MOVSPD+40% while firing, each arrow deals MAG DMG that equals to 30% of sum of your ATK and AP. Open extra 3 power sources, dealing MAG DMG equals to 5% of your ATK + AP.

Wildly unleash a torrent of light arrows for 2.5s, being invincible in the duration, but decreasing MOV SPD by 20%. Shoot all enemies 25 times within 5m, dealing PHY DMG that equals to 10% of sum of your ATK and AP each shot.

Wildly unleash a torrent of light arrows for 3s, being invincible in the duration, but decreasing MOV SPD by 20%. Shoot all enemies 30 times within 5m, dealing PHY DMG that equals to 13% of sum of your ATK and AP each shot.

Wildly unleash a torrent of light arrows for 3.5s, being invincible in the duration, but decreasing MOV SPD by 20%. Shoot all enemies 35 times within 5m, dealing PHY DMG that equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP each shot. Left a clone of Arrow Dance that can not move, dealing PHY DMG that equals to 7% of sum of your ATK and AP each shot

Wildly unleash a torrent of light arrows for 4s, being invincible in the duration, but decreasing MOV SPD by 20%. Shoot all enemies 40 times within 5m, dealing PHY DMG that equals to 21% of sum of your ATK and AP each shot. Left a clone of Arrow Dance that can not move, dealing PHY DMG that equals to 10% of sum of your ATK and AP each shot
Charge to an enemy, dealing 36% PHY DMG, and gain 200%ATK SPD for the next 3 Basic Attacks with extra 8% PHY DMG .
Charge to an enemy, dealing 50% PHY DMG, and gain 200%ATK SPD for the next 4 Basic Attacks with extra 10% PHY DMG.
Charge to an enemy, dealing 85% PHY DMG, and gain 200%ATK SPD for the next 5 Basic Attacks with extra 15% PHY DMG.
Charge to an enemy, dealing 160% PHY DMG, and gain 200%ATK SPD for the next 6 Basic Attacks with extra 20% PHY DMG.
Summon a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units, dealing up to 196% MAG DMG. Enemies affected by Black Hole have their MOV SPD slowed by 50%.
Summon a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units, dealing up to 280% MAG DMG. Enemies affected by Black Hole have their MOV SPD slowed by 50%.
Summon a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units, dealing up to 420% MAG DMG. Enemies affected by Black Hole have their MOV SPD slowed by 50%.Create a satellite blackhole that orbit you.
Summon a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units, dealing up to 714% MAG DMG. Enemies affected by Black Hole have their MOV SPD slowed by 50%.Create a satellite blackhole that orbit you.
Rapidly summon a blizzard 6 times in the target area, each blast dealing 18% MAG DMG to enemies.
Rapidly summon a blizzard 6 times in the target area, each blast dealing 28% MAG DMG to enemies.
Rapidly summon a blizzard 6 times in the target area, each blast dealing 46% MAG DMG to enemies.
Rapidly summon a blizzard 6 times in the target area, each blast dealing 75% MAG DMG to enemies.

Call a bomb to fall from the sky to the target location, knocking up enemies for 0.5s when it lands. Dealing 80% PHY DMG and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.5s. The bomb explodes for a short delay, dealing 40% PHY DMG

Call a bomb to fall from the sky to the target location, knocking up enemies for 0.5s when it lands. Dealing 120% PHY DMG and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.5s. The bomb explodes for a short delay, dealing 60% PHY DMG

Call a bomb to fall from the sky to the target location, knocking up enemies for 0.5s when it lands. Dealing 200% PHY DMG and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.5s. The bomb explodes for a short delay, dealing 100% PHY DMG

Call a bomb to fall from the sky to the target location, knocking up enemies for 0.5s when it lands. Dealing 320% PHY DMG and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.5s. The bomb explodes for a short delay, dealing 160% PHY DMG
Send out 3 magic Blades that deal 8% PHY DMG every 0.5 second, then they return back to you after a few moments. The returning Blades deal a bonus 40% PHY DMG to units hit.
Send out 3 magic Blades that deal 10% PHY DMG every 0.5 second, then they return back to you after a few moments. The returning Blades deal a bonus 60% PHY DMG to units hit.

Send out 4 magic Blades that deal 12% PHY DMG every 0.5 second, then they return back to you after a few moments. The returning Blades deal a bonus 75% PHY DMG to units hit. Send out 4 same magic Blades behind you.

Send out 5 magic Blades that deal 15% PHY DMG every 0.5 second, then they return back to you after a few moments. The returning Blades deal a bonus 95% PHY DMG to units hit. Send out 4 same magic Blades behind you.

Throw a shield that returns toward the starting direction after reaching its manximum range, dealing 13% PHY DMG to enemies it hits. If you catch the returning shield, it will grant you a shield equal to 11% of your ATK + AP and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Throw a shield that returns toward the starting direction after reaching its manximum range, dealing 20% PHY DMG to enemies it hits. If you catch the returning shield, it will grant you a shield equal to 16% of your ATK + AP and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Throw a shield that returns toward the starting direction after reaching its manximum range, dealing 31% PHY DMG to enemies it hits. If you catch the returning shield, it will grant you a shield equal to 25% of your ATK + AP and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Throw a shield that returns toward the starting direction after reaching its manximum range, dealing 47% PHY DMG to enemies it hits. If you catch the returning shield, it will grant you a shield equal to 38% of your ATK + AP and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.
When killed, prevents your death and immediately recover 16% of your Max HP. 90s CD.
When killed, prevents your death and immediately recovers 23% of your Max HP. 90s CD.
When killed, prevents your death and immediately recovers 36% of your Max HP. 90s CD.
When killed, prevents your death and immediately recovers 54% of your Max HP. 90s CD.
Morph into a Chaos Warrior and deal 32% continual PHY DMG per seceond to all nearby enemies. Also boosts ATK SPD 10%,ATK 25%, and MOV SPD 20% for 8s.
Morph into a Chaos Warrior and deal 48% continual PHY DMG per seceond to all nearby enemies. Also boosts ATK SPD 15%,ATK 30%, and MOV SPD 30% for 8s.
Morph into a Chaos Warrior and deal 64% continual PHY DMG per seceond to all nearby enemies. Also boosts ATK SPD 20%,ATK 45%, and MOV SPD 50% for 8s.
Morph into a Chaos Warrior and deal 80% continual PHY DMG per seceond to all nearby enemies. Also boosts ATK SPD 30%,ATK 80%, and MOV SPD 80% for 8s.
Swipe at those around you with great force, dealing 1 time of 25% PHY DMG.
Swipe at those around you with great force, dealing 2 times of 16% PHY DMG.
Swipe at those around you with great force, dealing 4 times of 16% PHY DMG.
Swipe at those around you with great force, dealing 4 times of 23% PHY DMG.
Each continuous Basic Attack boosts ATK SPD 5%, up to 6 stacks, but it will drop to zero if you go 3s without making a basic attack.
Each continuous Basic Attack boosts ATK SPD 6%, up to 8 stacks, but it will drop to zero if you go 3s without making a basic attack.
Each continuous Basic Attack boosts ATK SPD 8%, up to 10 stacks, but it will drop to zero if you go 3s without making a basic attack.
Each continuous Basic Attack boosts ATK SPD 10%, up to 12 stacks, but it will drop to zero if you go 3s without making a basic attack.
For the next 30s, boost DMG by 20% , but all Active skill CD lengthen by 10% during the effect.
For the next 30s, boost DMG by 30% , but all Active skill CD lengthen by 10% during the effect.
For the next 30s, boost DMG by 40% , but all Active skill CD lengthen by 10% during the effect.
For the next 30s, boost DMG by 50% , but all Active skill CD lengthen by 10% during the effect.
When attacked, there's a 20% chance of performing a helix counter, dealing 95% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius. 8s CD.
When attacked, there's a 40% chance of performing a helix counter, dealing 140% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius. 8s CD.
When attacked, there's a 70% chance of performing a helix counter, dealing 220% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius. 8s CD.
When attacked, there's a 100% chance of performing a helix counter, dealing 320% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius. 8s CD.
Basic Attacks have a 20% chance of making a shockwave, dealing bonus 70% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Basic Attacks have a 25% chance of making a shockwave, dealing bonus 80% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Basic Attacks have a 30% chance of making a shockwave, dealing bonus 100% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Basic Attacks have a 35% chance of making a shockwave, dealing bonus 120% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Fire 1 arrow of ice crystal in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy, it explodes and slows all surrounding enemy units, dealing MAG DMG equals to 13% of sum of your ATK and AP.
Fire 1 arrow of ice crystal in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy, it explodes and slows all surrounding enemy units, dealing MAG DMG equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP.
Fire 2 arrow of ice crystal in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy, it explodes and slows all surrounding enemy units, dealing MAG DMG equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP.
Fire 2 arrow of ice crystal in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy, it explodes and slows all surrounding enemy units, dealing MAG DMG equals to 23% of sum of your ATK and AP.
Open 1 rift to the darkness dealing an initial burst of 75% MAG DMG and roots the target for 1s, then explodes for a second burst of 100% MAG DMG after a delay.
Open 1 rift to the darkness dealing an initial burst of 110% MAG DMG and roots the target for 1.5s, then explodes for a second burst of 150% MAG DMG after a delay.
Open 3 rifts to the darkness dealing an initial burst of 190% MAG DMG and roots the target for 2s, then explodes for a second burst of 250% MAG DMG after a delay.
Open 3 rifts to the darkness dealing an initial burst of 300% MAG DMG and roots the target for 2.5s, then explodes for a second burst of 400% MAG DMG after a delay.

Call upon the God of Dawn, fire a huge shockwave that boosts allies for 20% Dodge rate (The highest dodge rate attainable is only up to 90%), while throwing enemies caught in the wave back by dealing MAG DMG that equals to 110% of sum of your ATK and AP.

Call upon the God of Dawn, fire a huge shockwave that boosts allies for 20% Dodge rate (The highest dodge rate attainable is only up to 90%), while throwing enemies caught in the wave back by dealing MAG DMG that equals to 200% of sum of your ATK and AP.

Call upon the God of Dawn, fire a huge shockwave that boosts allies for 20% Dodge rate (The highest dodge rate attainable is only up to 90%), while throwing enemies caught in the wave back by dealing MAG DMG that equals to 370% of sum of your ATK and AP. Shockwave knocks back enemies by 5m.

Call upon the God of Dawn, fire a huge shockwave that boosts allies for 20% Dodge rate (The highest dodge rate attainable is only up to 90%), while throwing enemies caught in the wave back by dealing MAG DMG that equals to 650% of sum of your ATK and AP. Shockwave knocks back enemies by 5m.
Each enemy death increases AP by 1.5%, up to 10 stacks. After 10s without an enemy death, all stacks are removed.
Each enemy death increases AP by 2.2%, up to 10 stacks. After 15s without an enemy death, all stacks are removed.
Each enemy death increases AP by 3.7%, up to 10 stacks. After 20s without an enemy death, all stacks are removed.
Each enemy death increases AP by 6%, up to 10 stacks. After 30s without an enemy death, all stacks are removed.
When an enemy is killed, there's a 50% chance of summoning an Ancient Skeleton Guard that fights enemies for 5s ,inheriting 25% HP, 15% ATK and 15% AP from your character.
When an enemy is killed, there's a 50% chance of summoning an Ancient Skeleton Guard that fights enemies for 6s ,inheriting 30% HP, 20% ATK and 20% AP from your character.

When an enemy is killed, there's a 50% chance of summoning an Ancient Skeleton Guard that fights enemies for 7s ,inheriting 35% HP, 30% ATK and 30% AP from your character. Ancient Skeleton Guard learned to spell Shadow Strike.

When an enemy is killed, there's a 50% chance of summoning an Ancient Skeleton Guard that fights enemies for 8s ,inheriting 40% HP, 45% ATK and 45% AP from your character. Ancient Skeleton Guard learned to spell Shadow Strike.
Strike a mighty blow at melee range, dealing 6% of your Current Health damage to yourself and 4 times of 36% PHY DMG to all enemies in a small area around you.
Strike a mighty blow at melee range, dealing 9% of your Current Health damage to yourself and 5 times of 43% PHY DMG to all enemies in a small area around you.
Strike a mighty blow at melee range, dealing 13% of your Current Health damage to yourself and 8 times of 45% PHY DMG to all enemies in a small area around you.
Strike a mighty blow at melee range, dealing 22% of your Current Health damage to yourself and 8 times of 72% PHY DMG to all enemies in a small area around you.
Summon an Earth Elemental that taunts enemies and fights using its fists, inheriting 40% HP, 30% ATK and 30% AP from your character, lasting 20s.
Summon an Earth Elemental that taunts enemies and fights using its fists, inheriting 50% HP, 42% ATK and 42% AP from your character, lasting 20s.
Summon an Earth Elemental that taunts enemies and fights using its fists, inheriting 60% HP, 65% ATK and 65% AP from your character, lasting 20s.
Summon an Earth Elemental that taunts enemies and fights using its fists, inheriting 70% HP, 95% ATK and 95% AP from your character, lasting 20s.

Create several Earth Protrusions that slows passing enemies. Dealing 20% MAG DMG when casted, then dealing 15% MAG DMG per second for 5s, up to a total of 75% MAG DMG, before exploding for a burst of 40% MAG DMG.

Create several Earth Protrusions that slows passing enemies. Dealing 30% MAG DMG when casted, then dealing 22% MAG DMG per second for 5s, up to a total of 110% MAG DMG, before exploding for a burst of 60% MAG DMG.

Create several Earth Protrusions that slows passing enemies. Dealing 50% MAG DMG when casted, then dealing 35% MAG DMG per second for 5s, up to a total of 175% MAG DMG, before exploding for a burst of 60% MAG DMG.

Create several Earth Protrusions that slows passing enemies. Dealing 80% MAG DMG when casted, then dealing 58% MAG DMG per second for 5s, up to a total of 290% MAG DMG, before exploding for a burst of 90% MAG DMG.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 20% chance of triggering 4 earthquakes, each blast dealing 40% MAG DMG and a 90% slow for 0.5s
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 20% chance of triggering 4 earthquakes, each blast dealing 60% MAG DMG and a 90% slow for 0.5s
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 20% chance of triggering 5 earthquakes, each blast dealing 80% MAG DMG and a 90% slow for 0.5s
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 20% chance of triggering 7 earthquakes, each blast dealing 90% MAG DMG and a 90% slow for 0.5s
Increases Damage Reduction as HP decreases: When HP is < 80%, gain 8% Damage Reduction When HP is < 50%, gain 20% Damage Reduction When HP is < 20%, gain 43% Damage Reduction.
Increases Damage Reduction as HP decreases: When HP is < 80%, gain 11% Damage Reduction When HP is < 50%, gain 27% Damage Reduction When HP is < 20%, gain 53% Damage Reduction.
Increases Damage Reduction as HP decreases: When HP is < 80%, gain 17% Damage Reduction When HP is < 50%, gain 38% Damage Reduction When HP is < 20%, gain 65% Damage Reduction.
Increases Damage Reduction as HP decreases: When HP is < 80%, gain 25% Damage Reduction When HP is < 50%, gain 50% Damage Reduction When HP is < 20%, gain 75% Damage Reduction.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 50% chance to summon an Ancient Skeleton Mage who fights enemies with ranged magic bolts for 5s, inheriting 20% HP, 25% ATK and 25% AP from your character.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 50% chance to summon an Ancient Skeleton Mage who fights enemies with ranged magic bolts for 6s, inheriting 25% HP, 35% ATK and 35% AP from your character.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 50% chance to summon an Ancient Skeleton Mage who fights enemies with ranged magic bolts for 7s, inheriting 30% HP, 50% ATK and 50% AP from your character.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 50% chance to summon an Ancient Skeleton Mage who fights enemies with ranged magic bolts for 8s, inheriting 35% HP, 75% ATK and 75% AP from your character.

Dash in a direction, leaving behind 1 clone that will attack enemies for 3s.Clone receives 900% more damage from enemies and explodes MAG DMG that equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP when being dead.

Dash in a direction, leaving behind 2 clone that will attack enemies for 3s.Clone receives 750% more damage from enemies and explodes explodes MAG DMG that equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP when being dead.

Dash in a direction, leaving behind 3 clone that will attack enemies for 3s.Clone receives 500% more damage from enemies and explodes explodes MAG DMG that equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP when being dead.

Dash in a direction, leaving behind 4 clone that will attack enemies for 3s.Clone receives 200% more damage from enemies and explodes explodes MAG DMG that equals to 15% of sum of your ATK and AP when being dead.
Place a fruit trap that blooms when walked over, dealing MAG DMG that equals to 38% of sum of your ATK and AP with an explosion.
Place a fruit trap that blooms when walked over, dealing MAG DMG that equals to 56% of sum of your ATK and AP with an explosion.

Place a fruit trap that blooms when walked over, dealing MAG DMG that equals to 95% of sum of your ATK and AP with an explosion. Create 8 mini fruits after explosion, each dealing MAG DMG equals to 10% of your ATK + AP.

Place a fruit trap that blooms when walked over, dealing MAG DMG that equals to 150% of sum of your ATK and AP with an explosion. Create 8 mini fruits after explosion, each dealing MAG DMG equals to 10% of your ATK + AP.

Summon a Faerie Dragon which heals allies attacking using ranged magic bolts,inheriting 15% HP, 10% ATK and 10% AP from your character, lasting 20s.\nWhen Faerie Dragon dies, it leaves a magic healing orb that restores HP that equals to 4% max HP of the character who touches it.

Summon a Faerie Dragon which heals allies attacking using ranged magic bolts,inheriting 20% HP, 15% ATK and 15% AP from your character, lasting 20s.\nWhen Faerie Dragon dies, it leaves a magic healing orb that restores HP that equals to 5.6% max HP of the character who touches it.

Summon a Faerie Dragon which heals allies attacking using ranged magic bolts,inheriting 25% HP, 25% ATK and 25% AP from your character, lasting 20s.\nWhen Faerie Dragon dies, it leaves a magic healing orb that restores HP that equals to 8.8% max HP of the character who touches it.

Summon a Faerie Dragon which heals allies attacking using ranged magic bolts,inheriting 30% HP, 35% ATK and 35% AP from your character, lasting 20s.\nWhen Faerie Dragon dies, it leaves a magic healing orb that restores HP that equals to 12.8% max HP of the character who touches it.
Being a slaughtering fanatic, your ATK SPD is increased by 45%, but damage of Basic ATK decrease by 15%.
Being a slaughtering fanatic, your ATK SPD is increased by 53%, but damage of Basic ATK decrease by 10%.
Being a slaughtering fanatic, your ATK SPD is increased by 70%, but damage of Basic ATK decrease by 5%.
Being a slaughtering fanatic, your ATK SPD is increased by 100%.
By using Evil power, there's a 20% chance to enable 30% Lifesteal for Basic Attacks.
By using Evil power, there's a 20% chance to enable 35% Lifesteal for Basic Attacks.
By using Evil power, there's a 20% chance to enable 45% Lifesteal for Basic Attacks.
By using Evil power, there's a 20% chance to enable 60% Lifesteal for Basic Attacks.
Channel the breath of a Phoenix, sending out 1 wave of fire scorching every enemy in its path, dealing 25% MAG DMG
Channel the breath of a Phoenix, sending out 1 wave of fire scorching every enemy in its path, dealing 32% MAG DMG
Channel the breath of a Phoenix, sending out 2 wave of fire scorching every enemy in its path, dealing 32% MAG DMG
Channel the breath of a Phoenix, sending out 2 wave of fire scorching every enemy in its path, dealing 46% MAG DMG
Fire a tracking flash bomb at a target enemy, dealing 108% PHY DMG to all enemies near the target and blinding them for 1s.
Fire a tracking flash bomb at a target enemy, dealing 160% PHY DMG to all enemies near the target and blinding them for 1.5s.
Fire a tracking flash bomb at a target enemy, dealing 270% PHY DMG to all enemies near the target and blinding them for 2s.
Fire a tracking flash bomb at a target enemy, dealing 430% PHY DMG to all enemies near the target and blinding them for 2.5s.
Cast several bolts of eldritch lightning power that pierce through enemies, dealing 3 times of 26% MAG DMG to targets in the area.
Cast several bolts of eldritch lightning power that pierce through enemies, dealing 4 times of 30% MAG DMG to targets in the area.
Cast several bolts of eldritch lightning power that pierce through enemies, dealing 6 times of 32% MAG DMG to targets in the area.
Cast several bolts of eldritch lightning power that pierce through enemies, dealing 8 times of 37% MAG DMG to targets in the area.
When attacked, cause a Frost Nova, dealing 50% MAG DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, and slowing enemies MOV SPD by 20% for 1s. 8s CD.
When attacked, cause a Frost Nova, dealing 70% MAG DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, and slowing enemies MOV SPD by 20% for 1.5s. 8s CD.
When attacked, cause a Frost Nova, dealing 120% MAG DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, and slowing enemies MOV SPD by 20% for 2s. 8s CD.
When attacked, cause a Frost Nova, dealing 190% MAG DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, and slowing enemies MOV SPD by 20% for 3s. 8s CD.
A ruthless assassin shows no mercy. Permanently boosts crit damage 60%.
A ruthless assassin shows no mercy. Permanently boosts crit damage 85%.
A ruthless assassin shows no mercy. Permanently boosts crit damage 125%.
A ruthless assassin shows no mercy. Permanently boosts crit damage 185%.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 30% chance of creating a pillar of flame, dealing 85% MAG DMG to surrounding enemies.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 35% chance of creating a pillar of flame, dealing 105% MAG DMG to surrounding enemies.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 40% chance of creating a pillar of flame, dealing 155% MAG DMG to surrounding enemies.
When any Active Skill is used, there's a 50% chance of creating a pillar of flame, dealing 200% MAG DMG to surrounding enemies.

Pull a blazing meteor from the sky towards a target area to summon a Hellfire Demon, dealing 140% MAG DMG and stuns enemies within the impact zone for 2s, inheriting 40% ATK, 40% AP and 50% HP from your character, lasting 20s. Hellfire leave a fireland when died.

Pull a blazing meteor from the sky towards a target area to summon a Hellfire Demon, dealing 200% MAG DMG and stuns enemies within the impact zone for 2.5s, inheriting 60% ATK, 60% AP and 60% HP from your character, lasting 20s. Hellfire leave a fireland when died.

Pull a blazing meteor from the sky towards a target area to summon a Hellfire Demon, dealing 340% MAG DMG and stuns enemies within the impact zone for 3s, inheriting 80% ATK, 80% AP and 70% HP from your character, lasting 20s. Hellfire leave a fireland when died. Hellfire learned to spell Charging.

Pull a blazing meteor from the sky towards a target area to summon a Hellfire Demon, dealing 540% MAG DMG and stuns enemies within the impact zone for 4s, inheriting 100% ATK, 100% AP and 80% HP from your character, lasting 20s. Hellfire leave a fireland when died. Hellfire learned to spell Charging.
Periodically marks enemies nearby for 4s.Marked targets will receive 25% extra damage.
Periodically marks enemies nearby for 4s.Marked targets will receive 35% extra damage.
Periodically marks enemies nearby for 4s.Marked targets will receive 60% extra damage.
Periodically marks enemies nearby for 4s.Marked targets will receive 95% extra damage.

Plant a Ice Lotus which flourish over 5 seconds, breeze that surround the florescent Lotus, slows and deals 7% MAG DMG per 0.5 second to nearby enemy. The florescent Lotus lasts 15s, then it bursts and freezes enemy 5s by dealing 30% MAG DMG. If an enemy touches the Lotus before its florescence, the Lotus prematurely bursts and freezes enemy 2s.

Plant a Ice Lotus which flourish over 5 seconds, breeze that surround the florescent Lotus, slows and deals 10% MAG DMG per 0.5 second to nearby enemy. The florescent Lotus lasts 15s, then it bursts and freezes enemy 5s by dealing 40% MAG DMG. If an enemy touches the Lotus before its florescence, the Lotus prematurely bursts and freezes enemy 3s.

Plant a Ice Lotus which flourish over 5 seconds, breeze that surround the florescent Lotus, slows and deals 17% MAG DMG per 0.5 second to nearby enemy. The florescent Lotus lasts 15s, then it bursts and freezes enemy 5s by dealing 65% MAG DMG. If an enemy touches the Lotus before its florescence, the Lotus prematurely bursts and freezes enemy 4s.

Plant a Ice Lotus which flourish over 5 seconds, breeze that surround the florescent Lotus, slows and deals 27% MAG DMG per 0.5 second to nearby enemy. The florescent Lotus lasts 15s, then it bursts and freezes enemy 5s by dealing 100% MAG DMG. If an enemy touches the Lotus before its florescence, the Lotus prematurely bursts and freezes enemy 5s.
Shield yourself and all friendly units in a large area around you for 40% of AP. When an individual shield breaks, it deals 20% MAG DMG to nearby enemies.
Shield yourself and all friendly units in a large area around you for 60% of AP. When an individual shield breaks, it deals 30% MAG DMG to nearby enemies.
Shield yourself and all friendly units in a large area around you for 100% of AP. When an individual shield breaks, it deals 50% MAG DMG to nearby enemies.
Shield yourself and all friendly units in a large area around you for 160% of AP. When an individual shield breaks, it deals 85% MAG DMG to nearby enemies.
Summon a sphere of ice to a target area that explodes, dealing 30% MAG DMG to all enemies in the area, plus a 50% slowdown for 0.5s.
Summon a sphere of ice to a target area that explodes, dealing 45% MAG DMG to all enemies in the area, plus a 50% slowdown for 0.5s.

Summon a sphere of ice to a target area that explodes, dealing 70% MAG DMG to all enemies in the area, plus a 50% slowdown for 0.5s.Create a icey pillar after explosion, dealing 2 times of 5% MAG DMG.

Summon a sphere of ice to a target area that explodes, dealing 100% MAG DMG to all enemies in the area, plus a 50% slowdown for 0.5s.Create a icey pillar after explosion, dealing 2 times of 10% MAG DMG.
Basic Attacks have a 25% chance of impaling the enemy, dealing 45% bonus PHY DMG to target and 15% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Basic Attacks have a 25% chance of impaling the enemy, dealing 60% bonus PHY DMG to target and 20% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Basic Attacks have a 25% chance of impaling the enemy, dealing 90% bonus PHY DMG to target and 30% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
Basic Attacks have a 25% chance of impaling the enemy, dealing 120% bonus PHY DMG to target and 40% PHY DMG to enemies nearby the target.
When attacked, there's a 20% chance of dealing 72% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, stunning up to 5 surrounding enemies for 2s. 8s CD.
When attacked, there's a 40% chance of dealing 105% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, stunning up to 7 surrounding enemies for 2.5s. 8s CD.
When attacked, there's a 70% chance of dealing 165% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, stunning up to 9 surrounding enemies for 3s. 8s CD.
When attacked, there's a 100% chance of dealing 240% PHY DMG to all enemies within a 3 meter radius, stunning up to 12 surrounding enemies for 4s. 8s CD.
